mapper.select: SELECT cid, MID, cardno, bank, MASTER, zdmonth, zdday, hkday, period, hkprice, yxdate, cxpass, paypass, sncode, gdate, ischeck ,pic_url FROM ( (SELECT cid, MID, cardno, bank, MASTER, zdmonth, zdday, hkday, period, hkprice, yxdate, cxpass, paypass, sncode, gdate, ischeck FROM `t_zjgj_card` WHERE mid = #{mid} ) AS a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ch_name, pic_url FROM `t_bank` ) AS b ON a.bank = b.ch_name )
SELECT tid, MID, mobile_sys, mobile_type, mobile_no, login_area,login_date FROM `t_app_login_check` WHERE MID = #{mid} ORDER BY gdate DESC
select mobile, trade_no, is_done, is_valid, gdate from t_xy_spider_mobile where mobile = #{mobile}
select tid, trade_no, email_no, status, cdate, gdate from t_xy_spider_email where mid = #{mid}
mapper.update: update t_zjgj_member set UserPass = #{pass} where mobile = #{mobile}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_zjgj_member where mobile = #{mobile}
select trade_no from t_xy_spider_mobile where mobile = #{mobile}
select mobile from t_zjgj_member where mid = #{mid}
select mid, username, userpass, Regdate from t_zjgj_member where username = #{username} and userpass = #{password}
select tid, username, userpass from t_sys_user where username = #{username} and userpass = #{password}
select mid, txn_type, trade_no, is_done, is_valid,is_used, cdate from `t_xy_spider_person` where mid = #{mid}
select list_content from `t_app_server_list` where mid = #{mid}
select count(1) from `t_zjgj_card` where `cardno` = #{cardno}
SELECT count(1) FROM `t_xy_spider_person` WHERE `mid` = #{mid} AND `txn_type` = #{txn_type};
select mid, txn_type, trade_no, is_done, is_valid, is_used, cdate, gdate from `t_xy_spider_person` WHERE `mid` = #{mid} AND `txn_type` = #{type};
select mid, username, nick, userrole, verfiy_flag, mobile from `t_zjgj_member` where `mid` = #{mid}
select real_xygd from `t_zjgj_member` where `mid` = #{mid}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `t_rc_pos_assign` WHERE merchantcode = #{mobile}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `t_rc_pos` WHERE merchantcode = #{mobile}
select mid from `t_xy_spider_person` where trade_no = #{order}
select count(1) from `t_zjgj_aidgold_telog_xy` where mid = #{mid} and te_type = #{type}
SELECT mid, mobile, bank_open, account_name, account_number FROM `t_zjgj_member_bank` WHERE `mid` = #{mid};
select ispay from `wx_order` WHERE `orderid` = #{orderid};
mapper.insert: insert into t_zjgj_epay_payment (rid, mid, orderid, amount, ptype, mobile, idno, AcctNo, AcctName, AcctBank, AcctBankName, skdate, status, remark, thirdvoucher, bussSeqNo, ptimes, overday, overmoney, attr1 ) values (#{rid}, #{mid}, #{orderid}, #{totalfee}, #{ptype}, #{mobile}, "", #{account_number}, #{account_name}, "0000", #{bank_open}, #{orderdate}, "0", #{body}, "", "", "0", #{overday}, #{overmoney},#{period} )
mapper.update:
update `t_drp_tixian_apply` set status = #{status} where tid in
#{item}
mapper.insert:
insert into `t_zjgj_tx` (`order_code`,`allocation_code`,`withdraw_code`,`mid`, `money`,`dzmoney`,`source`,`period`,`status`, `rsp_code`,`rsp_msg`, `status_date`,`member_bank_id`,`create_by`,`create_date`, `update_by`,`update_date`,`remarks`,`del_flag`,`txtype`) values
(#{item.txcode}, #{item.txcode}, #{item.txcode}, #{item.mid}, #{item.money}, #{item.dzmoney}, #{item.source}, #{item.period}, #{item.status}, NULL,NULL, #{item.cdate}, NULL,NULL, #{item.cdate}, NULL,NULL,NULL, #{item.del_flag}, #{item.txtype})
